mapper.select: select u.user_id userId, u.username, u.password, u.dept_id deptId, u.email, u.mobile, u.status, u.crate_time crateTime, u.modify_time modifyTime, u.LAST_LOGIN_TIME lastLoginTime, u.ssex, u.theme theme, u.avatar, u.description, d.dept_name deptName, u.staff_id staffId, s.name staffName, s.region_id regionId, r.region_name regionName, u.staff_type staffType, decode(u.staff_type, 0, '超级管理员', 1, '区域管理员', 2, '普通人员') staffTypeName from t_user u, t_dept d, staff s, spc_region r where 1 = 1 and u.dept_id = d.dept_id(+) and u.staff_id = s.staff_id(+) and s.region_id = r.region_id(+) and lower(u.username) = #{userName}

select u.user_id userId, u.username, u.dept_id deptId, u.email, u.mobile, u.status, u.ssex, ur.role_id roleId, u.staff_id staffId, s.name staffName, s.region_id regionId, r.region_name regionName, u.staff_type staffType, decode(u.staff_type, 0, '超级管理员', 1, '区域管理员', 2, '普通人员') staffTypeName from t_user u, t_user_role ur, staff s, spc_region r where 1 = 1 and u.user_id = ur.user_id(+) and u.staff_id = s.staff_id(+) and s.region_id = r.region_id(+) and u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT U.USERNAME, U.USER_ID userId, D.DEPT_NAME deptName, U.mobile, U.email, U.avatar, U.description, U.ssex, U.dept_id deptId, listagg(r.role_name, '，') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY r.role_id) AS roleName, u.staff_id staffId, s.name staffName, s.region_id regionId, r.region_name regionName, u.staff_type staffType, decode(u.staff_type, 0, '超级管理员', 1, '区域管理员', 2, '普通人员') staffTypeName FROM t_user U LEFT JOIN t_dept D ON U.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN T_USER_ROLE ur ON U.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id left join staff s on (u.staff_id = s.staff_id) left join spc_region r on (s.region_id = r.region_id) WHERE 1 = 1 and U .USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY U.username, D.dept_name, U.mobile, U.email, U.avatar, U.description, U.ssex, U.USER_ID, U.dept_id, u.staff_id, s.name, s.region_id, r.region_name, u.staff_type
